comment: Don't need to say too much. Mr. Hatcher is one of the best professors I've ever had. He was funny and really tried his best to develop a relationship with each student. His class is also super straight forward and fun. 10/10 recommend
Very good professor. He was a very clear grader and I never had issues contacting him.

The best teacher I have ever had. At the beginning of the semester he gives a list that LITERALLY tells you what subtracts points. Follow that list and you have a guaranteed 100%. He is also a very caring dude and funny too. Most def recommend.

I'm a freshman but this is my favorite teacher thus far. He was very nice and he tried to make a connection with every student. There were dissuasions every week and 3 essays with two having rough drafts. I would definitely take this class again and I highly recommend to anyone.

He is a caring instructor and gives very good feedback. I do agree with the lectures, they are very easy to understand and he does give lots of bonus points. Unfortunately that doesn't apply to the papers you're going to have to write for this class, always ask for help when you need it he will help you. Have fun :D

He is overall easy to pay attention and isn't strict in class. However that is what makes it so surprising when you get your grades back. He is super nitpicky about the little things. He goes over a document that he has posted labeled "how I grade". This can be super helpful but with dozens of things on it he has plenty to take off for.

The best English professor I have ever had. He gives bonus points added onto essays just for showing up to class. Genuinely cares about his students and how they are doing. Very relatable and easy-going professor. Attendance isn't necessarily mandatory, but showing up will benefit you more than not coming.

Prof Hatcher is the best English teacher I have ever had. He is straight to the point and compassionate towards his students. I suck at writing but he lets you pick what topics you write about for all 3 essays in the semester He gives out extra credit and you only have 1 discussion post a week and it is 1-3 sentences most of the time. take him 100%
best prof. in Kennesaw. very understanding and works with students

Loved his class for 1101, Very chill prof, and has students best interest at heart. He gives really good constructive criticism and attendance is not mandatory. Outside workload is minimum to none if you work on it during class. 10/10!
Awesome professor, can be a bit of a tough grader at first but if you take his feedback, go to class, and put in a good effort you have a really good chance at an A. Participation in class is graded.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Really amazing professor who's assigns easy work. Barely any reading and the writing assignments were enjoyable. Only had class once a week and sometimes there would be group in class work but not for a grade just peer review and discussions. Really recommend!

Professor Hatcher was the best professor I have had in a while. He is very caring and he prioritizes the mental well-being of his students. I 10/10 recommend his class. A discussion board post every week and three papers make up the grade for the class.

I had Professor Hatcher for English Composition 1101 and specifically registered for his class again with 1102. He creates a very safe, inclusive space for learning and discussion. He is very lenient with due dates and grading and is more focused on students' actual understanding of the content. 10/10 would recommend he's so funny.
Professor Hatcher really cares about his students. The assignments are always interesting and rarely boring. The essays aren't difficult and I would recommend taking him for English.
Instructor Hatcher is amazing! Very flexible with assignments and cares about students. Very entertaining lectures and creative assignments. 10/10 would recommend!
Professor Hatcher was by far my favorite professor I had this semester. He is extremely funny and very easy going. There are only 3 essays and they were all fairly easy. 10/10 would recommend him.

Very cool guy who knows what he's talking about. He's a very easy grader and is pretty funny as well. He lets and even encourages you to write in first person which is odd at first but overall makes the class super easy.

My favorite professor by far ! Only grades are 3 main papers which were fairly easy as well as a few discussion posts and some online assignments but it was never a work overload !! Will give you more than enough time to complete  assignments. The lectures were always engaging as well
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Hatcher is a realy good professor and his class is really fun.  As long as your essays are well structured and have correct grammer its going to be easy. class isnt mandatory but some assignments require going to class or you wont get credit. overall great professor
I literally love his class 100/10 would take again

Professor Hatcher is a great guy and I loved having him for 1102. He really cares about his students and does not let his beliefs get in the way of his grading (had bad experiences with other teachers). His class had participation based assignments and essays but it was easy to get an A. 10/10 would recommend.

I took this course online. There were weekly readings but you can get by without them. Several short, easy discussions. Only grades are the papers, writing assignments, attendance, and the syllabus questions. He is a very kind teacher who genuinely cares.

If you are looking for a GREAT professor for English to check it off your gen ed., TAKE HIM! Professor Hatcher is very caring about his students and is VERY WILLING to help those who need it! He gives opportunities to resubmit papers (not rough drafts) if you visit the writing center! If you need some English encouragement, take Professor Hatcher!

3 Papers and participation for your grade. He grades a rough draft for the first and final essay which helps you get a better grade in the final draft. Discussion grade weekly. Just stay on top of your essays and it is an easy A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Hatcher is an amazing teacher. He really values participation in his class , so if you turn your assignments in on time, attend and participate in class, and ask questions you will get an A. He is a pretty easy grader and gives you revision opportunities on any essay, rough draft or annotated bibs he assigns.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Hatcher was my first online class I have ever taken and he made the transition so smooth. He was clear in his criticism and genuinely cares about your success in his class. I have him for ENGL1102 and I am so excited. You will make amazing grades!

Professor Hatcher is what you want as a professor. He gives detailed and phenomenal feedback and is a bit more lenient with papers at the beginning but his standards do increase, as they should. If you have something going on, he will work with you, all you have to do is talk to him. He is one of the best Professors KSU has to offer(in my opinion)!
